title: Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Izum, Novoplatonivka, Slovyansk, Yampolivka, Terny, Lyman, Torske, Siversk, Riznykiv...
content: Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Izum, Novoplatonivka, Slovyansk, Yampolivka, Terny, Lyman, Torske, Siversk, Riznykivka, Dachne, Novodmytrivka, Toretsk, Nelipivka, Petrivka, Valentynivka, Kurakhove, Andriyivka, Velyka Novosilka, Stepove, Temyrivka, Lobkove and Zelene Pole, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine reports
author: Live UA Map
